pullrequest.title: Update physics state even when paused (not stepping)

content.raw:
@{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} Thanks a lot for this change! This is coming with a perfect timing, it’s something I needed these days. I noticed though that, despite the ECM is updated accordingly, the GUI does not show the updated models.

This is what I tried:

* Start the server with `server->Run(/*blocking=*/false, /*iterations=*/1, /*paused=*/true)`
* Insert a new model in `0 0 0` \(the entities are created in both ECM and physics, the GUI shows it\)
* Set a new model pose using the `WorldPoseCmd` component \(if, after a paused step executed in background by the running Physics system, I read the `Pose` component of the model, it reports correctly the new pose, this means that the changes of this PR are working fine\)

However, the model in the GUI stays in `0 0 0`. Is there any way to update also visualization? I can see the model in the new pose only after an unpaused simulator step.

‌
